newsitem.title: USA: NYSE to suspend Diana common.
newsitem.headline: NYSE to suspend Diana common.

text.p: The New York Stock Exchange said Friday trading in Diana Corp common will be suspended before the opening of trading on Monday, March 10, or such earlier date as the stock begins trading on another securities marketplace.
Following suspension, the exchange said, application will be made to delist the issue.
The NYSE noted it normally gives consideration to delisting the security of a company when the operating assets have been substantialy reduced.
With the recent sale of assets of Atlanta Provision Co, Diana is subject to delisting under this criterion, it added.
